nodes.text:
## Group Structure Hierachy for understanding:

- Betriebsweisen
	- Zander
	- Dadant
- Produkte
	- Honig
		- Creme
		- Met
	- Wachs

## JSON Structure:
```json
{
	"nodes":[
		{"id":"693994ba02763967","x":-155,"y":-173,"width":1155,"height":733,"type":"group","label":"Produkte"},
		{"id":"fc52abf531bf32ed","type":"group","x":-155,"y":-800,"width":400,"height":520,"label":"Betriebsweisen"},
		{"id":"edf67cb95de16da5","type":"group","x":23,"y":-6,"width":417,"height":400,"label":"Honig"},
		{"id":"8a926bb9e06e4e70","x":520,"y":-6,"width":400,"height":400,"type":"group","label":"Wachs"},
		{"id":"48375aaa516ad477","x":-74,"y":-740,"width":238,"height":200,"type":"group","label":"Zander"},
		{"id":"328497f2fd72363f","type":"group","x":-74,"y":-460,"width":238,"height":134,"label":"Dadant"},
		{"id":"a6cbfab7973dabe0","x":73,"y":121,"width":167,"height":139,"type":"group","label":"Met"},
		{"id":"968ca88c3800eff7","type":"group","x":256,"y":125,"width":167,"height":139,"label":"Creme"},
	],
	"edges":[]
}
```


#### getChildren() should result in this:

```json
{
	"nodes":[
		{"id":"693994ba02763967","x":-155,"y":-173,"width":1155,"height":733,"type":"group","label":"Produkte", children:[Honig, Creme, Met, Wachs]},
		{"id":"fc52abf531bf32ed","type":"group","x":-155,"y":-800,"width":400,"height":520,"label":"Betriebsweisen, children:[Dadant, Zander]},
		{"id":"edf67cb95de16da5","type":"group","x":23,"y":-6,"width":417,"height":400,"label":"Honig", children:[Met, Wachs]},
		{"id":"8a926bb9e06e4e70","x":520,"y":-6,"width":400,"height":400,"type":"group","label":"Wachs" children:[]}
		{"id":"48375aaa516ad477","x":-74,"y":-740,"width":238,"height":200,"type":"group","label":"Zander" children:[]},
		{"id":"328497f2fd72363f","type":"group","x":-74,"y":-460,"width":238,"height":134,"label":"Dadant" children:[]},
		{"id":"a6cbfab7973dabe0","x":73,"y":121,"width":167,"height":139,"type":"group","label":"Met" children:[]},
		{"id":"968ca88c3800eff7","type":"group","x":256,"y":125,"width":167,"height":139,"label":"Creme" children:[]},
	],
	"edges":[]
}
```

#### cleanupChildren()
the Tree is not correctly implemented:
since Honig.children = [Met, Wachs] are in Produkte.children also included => this can be reduced to children:[Honig, Wachs]

```
{
	"nodes":[
		{"id":"693994ba02763967","x":-155,"y":-173,"width":1155,"height":733,"type":"group","label":"Produkte", children:[Honig, Wachs]},
		{"id":"fc52abf531bf32ed","type":"group","x":-155,"y":-800,"width":400,"height":520,"label":"Betriebsweisen, children:[Dadant, Zander]},
		{"id":"edf67cb95de16da5","type":"group","x":23,"y":-6,"width":417,"height":400,"label":"Honig", children:[Met, Wachs]},
		{"id":"8a926bb9e06e4e70","x":520,"y":-6,"width":400,"height":400,"type":"group","label":"Wachs" children:[]}
		{"id":"48375aaa516ad477","x":-74,"y":-740,"width":238,"height":200,"type":"group","label":"Zander" children:[]},
		{"id":"328497f2fd72363f","type":"group","x":-74,"y":-460,"width":238,"height":134,"label":"Dadant" children:[]},
		{"id":"a6cbfab7973dabe0","x":73,"y":121,"width":167,"height":139,"type":"group","label":"Met" children:[]},
		{"id":"968ca88c3800eff7","type":"group","x":256,"y":125,"width":167,"height":139,"label":"Creme" children:[]},
	],
	"edges":[]
}
```
